analyzed: dāna balena samudgata buddhaḥ dāna bala adhipatā narasiṃhe

original: dānabalekṣaka śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 1 ||
analyzed: dāna bala īkṣaka śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam
śīla balena samudgata buddhaḥ śīla bala adhipatā narasiṃhe

original: śīlabalekṣaka śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 2 ||
analyzed: śīla bala īkṣaka śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam
kṣānti balena samudgata buddhaḥ kṣānti bala adhipatā narasiṃhe

original: kṣāntibalekṣaka śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 3 ||
analyzed: kṣānti bala īkṣaka śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam
vīrya balena samudgata buddhaḥ vīrya bala adhipatā narasiṃhe

original: vīryabalekṣaka śruyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 4 ||
analyzed: vīrya bala īkṣaka śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam
dhyāna balena samudgata buddhaḥ dhyāna bala adhipatā narasiṃhe

original: dhyānabalekṣaka śruyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 5 ||
analyzed: dhyāna bala īkṣaka śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam
prajña balena samudgata buddhaḥ prajña bala adhipatā narasiṃhe

original: prajñabalekṣaka śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 6 ||
analyzed: prajña bala īkṣaka śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam
